title: Inochigake demo Tarinai no sa
original_name: 命がけでもたりないのさ
sinopse:
Yuika Kagami is a 15 year old schoolgirl that is in the search of thrilling and exciting experiences. She ends up meeting with her school's "Game Club" and realizes that she might be able to fulfill her youth by driving a GTR R34 just as the one her father used to race with.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
